first: Gura unatumize ibicuruzwa kuri murandasi ukoresheje urubuga rwacu
watchDesc: Amasaha meza utasanga mu Rwanda ku biciro binogeye buri wese.
jewelryDesc: Gura imiringa myiza ku mafaranga make.
fastDeliveryDesc: Tugeza ibicuruzwa byihuse kubakiriya bose hirya no hino mu Rwanda
customerSupport: Dutanga serivisi zo kwita ku bakiriya 24/7
whoDesc: NIHE-MART ni ikigo gikorera kuri murandasi gishyira imbere ibyifuzo byumukiriya no kunyurwa kwe. Turangura ibicuruzwa byacu hanze, ibicuruzwa bidasanzwe byujuje ubuziranenge kandi bitaboneka mu Rwanda tukabigurisha dufite intego yo kubigurisha make ashoboka kuri serivisi yihuse kandi yizewe.
missionDesc: NIHE-MART ifite intego yo kuba igisubizo cy'ikibaza ngo NIHE nakura igikoresho runaka. Vuba cyane twifuza kuba twaba dufite ibikoresho bigera kuri 70% y'ibiba kw'isi yose, bityo ntihagire umunyarwanda wongera kwifuza ikintu ngo agitumize hanze cyagwa ngo akibure.
form: Uzuza form utwandikire, igitekerezo cyawe turahita tukibona.
